research_project_title.ja: リーマン多様体の計量構造と多様体構造

description.ja: リーマン多様体の種々の計量不変量（曲率，体積，直径，距離関数）の性質と，計量不変量の多様体構造への関連

research_project_title.en: Metric structure and Manifold Structure of Riemannian manifolds

description.en: The relation between metric invariants of Riemannian manifolds (curvature, volume, diameter, distance function), and the relation of metric invariants to the manifold structure
